name: Villager
heading: NPT-01: Villager (Generic)
desc: Average build, simple tunic and trousers. Earth tones.

name: Merchant
heading: NPT-02: Merchant
desc: Round body, large hat, traveling pack. Rich brown coat, gold trim.

name: Farmer
heading: NPT-03: Farmer
desc: Sturdy build, straw hat, tool over shoulder. Tan overalls, green shirt.

name: Scholar
heading: NPT-04: Scholar
desc: Thin, hunched over book. Glasses. Dark blue robe. Quick, distracted walk.

name: Guard
heading: NPT-05: Guard/Warrior
desc: Broad shoulders, simple armor, spear or sword. Chain mail gray, leather brown.

name: Child
heading: NPT-06: Child
desc: Small (1.5 heads tall). Quick, bouncy walk. Bright tunic, short pants.
